alert.note: Alert for Bradford; Central Marion; Eastern Alachua; Eastern Marion; Western Alachua; Western Clay; Western Marion; Western Putnam (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 20 at 7:39AM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Bradford, southeastern Alachua, north central Marion, west central Putnam and southwestern Clay Counties through 815 AM EDT... At 738 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Rochelle, or 9 miles south of Gainesville, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Gainesville, Interlachen, Keystone Heights, Melrose, Hawthorne, University Of Florida, Lake Geneva, Rochelle, Melrose Landing and Cross Creek. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Bradford; Central Marion; Eastern Alachua; Eastern Marion; Western Alachua; Western Clay; Western Marion; Western Putnam
